pages.text: The $(marked)Golden Coronation$() is an essential part of ascension. It is used to summon a $(l:miskatonicmysteries:bestiary/prince)$(marked)Tattered Prince$() from the depths of Carcosa.$(br)The Rite will require four loyal $(marked)Serfs$() nearby, as well as $(l:miskatonicmysteries:world/occult_knowledge#hastur_knowledge)$(marked)their secret$(). These Serfs are usually manually recruited, but they can also just think very highly of you.$(br)Once started, the Rite will require a sufficient sacrifice to establish a connection.

pages.obfuscated_text: give them blood, gallons of the stuff
pages.text: We recommend using a sheep or a pig rather than a villager, as Serfs are not very enthusiastic about manslaughter.
